title: Scuttle Crab should grow a mustache when eating honey fruit beside Braum.
body: Since no one has said it yet :^)

replies.body: Baron should grow a mustache if he eats my adc's face while near Braum.
Another reason for my ADC to feed?  Please stop giving them ideas!
it's also a reason for enemy ADC to feed too. Makes game less snowbally if enemy team is ahead enough to do uncontested baron
Braum's W should put a mustache on whoever he jumps to
Girl with beard you say? Very well.
The Bearded Lady!? Scuttle Crab is Nagakabouros confirmed.
{{champion:420}} Bearded Lady, Nagakabouros, names don't matter! Stache does.
Whenever Braum pops a honeyfruit, the fruit should have mustaches and whoever eats the 'stached fruit should also grow a mustache.

I saw the interaction between scuttle and honeyfruit as something harmless but oh boy, if you are somewhat in a rush and decide to replenish a bit of health right before you gank and the freaking crab stands on one of the fruits you're in for a mouthful of rage inducing: WTF CRAB, GET OUT OF HERE!
banning braum every game, scuttle lives matter.
At the least, the scuttle should taunt when eating the fruit.
I agree with all current comments
She should get a top hat when eating next to TK.
{{champion:5}} too, he's manlier than Braum himself.
Honestly this feels like a huge waste of resources since scuttle crab dies very often and waiting for it to eat is counter productive.
